H3.text: when did the detroit pistons last win the championship. 2004 NBA Finals

A4.text: This marked the Pistons' fifth championship victory overall as a franchise... and their first since their back-to-back championships in 1989 and 1990.

A5.text: Detroit would return to the Finals in 2004, and upset the Kobe Bryant and Shaquille O'Neal-led Los Angeles Lakers in five games for their most recent championship.

A6.text: The Pistons defeated the Trail Blazers in five games to repeat as NBA champions.
